comments.body: With this added, is it possible to go down to a single `zio.App`, rather than separate versions for JS / JVM?

I think so. We may need a separate method with platform specific exit logic like we had in the bootstrap version of the ZIO Test internal test suite. I will work on this in a subsequent PR if that is alright.
